headline: Steady Dividends from Industrial Strength: Pentair (PNR) in Focus
summary: Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR) is included among the Top 10 Safest Dividend Stocks in the UK. Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR) is an American company focused on water treatment solutions. While its headquarters are in the United States, the company is legally registered in Ireland and has its tax residence in the United Kingdom. Piper Sandler recently identified […]
